> Kai Blin wrote:
>> According to samba4's prog_guide.txt:
>> "That said, I don't want to invent a new style, instead I would like
>> to adopt the style used by the Linux kernel."
> 
>   I wonder if the old "indent" program has the right options
> to do the Linux Kernel style: that would make it easy for individual
> to develop in the style they prefer, but contribute in the shared style.

See scripts/Lindent in the lk tree. I just checked int
script/format_indent.sh in the SAMBA_3_0 tree earlier today.
